data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu, Vietnam to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, help every believer in Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu, Vietnam be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Akha people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, encourage the 21,517 believers in Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu, Vietnam to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu, Vietnam.
